br.com.caelum.vraptor.http

Interface MutableResponse

  • All Superinterfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VRaptorResponse

    public interface MutableResponse
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse
    A response that can add listeners to Redirects
    Author:
    Lucas Cavalcanti, Caires Vinicius, Adriano Almeida
